name: Sofia's Enthralling Embrace
restraintStruggle: [TargetName] struggles against the magical circles coiled around [TargetHisOrHer] wrists and [AttackerName]'s powerful wings wrapped around [TargetHimOrHer], all while [AttackerHeOrShe] continues to spin a hypnotic magic circle in front of [TargetHisOrHer] eyes...
restraintStruggleCharmed: [TargetName] weakly squirms against the magical circles coiled around [TargetHisOrHer] wrists and [AttackerName]'s powerful wings wrapped around [TargetHimOrHer], finding it harder and harder to ignore [AttackerHisOrHer] mind melting magic spiral in front of [TargetHisOrHer] eyes...
restraintEscapedFail: But [TargetName] can't get free of [AttackerName]'s enthralling embrace!
